text.div:
observationValueConceptSearchParameter

Parameter value-concept:token

Searches for an observation whose value is a concept that matches the provided concept code eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?value-concept={concept}

ResourceObservation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesObservation
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: observationValueConceptSearchParameter
description: Searches for an observation whose value is a concept that matches the provided concept code eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?value-concept={concept}
